amendment.description: To authorize the transportation of dependents to the presence of members of the Armed Forces who are retired for illness or injury as a result of active duty.

vote.text: Amendment SA 828 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 828 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S6921; text: CR S6921) To authorize the transportation of dependents to the presence of members of the Armed Forces who are retired for illness or injury as a result of active duty.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 828 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 828 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kerry.
